A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The biggest mistake Disney made with this movie is turning it over to Rian Johnson.  I thought JJ Abrams had a pretty solid story in The Force Awakens\, so why didn't the leave this with him?  Rian Johnson crapped all over the Star Wars universe\, killed off some of the best characters left and gave us really annoying new characters.  Worst of all\, he left us the image of Leia Poppins that I can't get out of my head.  Thanks for that.
